author: Gary 'gaz' Regan
description: Basically an Aviation but with triple sec in place of maraschino and lime instead of lemon juice. Gaz used lime juice because he didn't have any lemons but in this adaptation of his recipe I've mellowed the citrus sourness by using a combination of both lime and lemon juice.
name: Moonlight Cocktail (Gaz Regan's)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
